scripts.codegen: graph codegen --output-dir generated/eth-bsc subgraph-eth.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir generated/eth-bsc subgraph-bsc.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir generated/neura subgraph-neura.yaml
scripts.build-all: yarn build-devnet-eth && yarn build-testnet-eth && yarn build-bsc && yarn build-neura
scripts.create-all: yarn create-devnet-eth && yarn create-testnet-eth && yarn create-bsc && yarn create-testnet-neura && yarn create-devnet-neura
scripts.create-local-all: yarn create-local-eth && yarn create-local-bsc && yarn create-local-neura
scripts.remove-local-all: yarn remove-local-eth && yarn remove-local-bsc && yarn remove-local-neura
scripts.remove-all: yarn remove-devnet-eth && yarn remove-testnet-eth && yarn remove-bsc && yarn remove-devnet-neura && yarn remove-testnet-neura
scripts.deploy-local-devnet-eth: graph deploy --network sepolia-dev --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 test-eth subgraph-eth.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-testnet-eth: graph deploy --network sepolia-test --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 test-eth subgraph-eth.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-bsc: graph deploy --network chapel --node http://localhost:9020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 test-bsc subgraph-bsc.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-neura: graph deploy --network neura --node http://localhost:10020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 test-neura subgraph-neura.yaml
scripts.deploy-local-all: yarn deploy-local-devnet-eth && yarn deploy-local-testnet-eth && yarn deploy-local-bsc && yarn deploy-local-neura
scripts.deploy-all: yarn deploy-devnet-eth && yarn deploy-testnet-eth && yarn deploy-bsc && yarn deploy-devnet-neura && yarn deploy-testnet-neura
